title: PranaX lands $17m to harness exosomes in regenerative biologics
summary: Company initially targets ‘exosome-based wellness’ after licensing new technologies developed at the University of Texas. US biotech PranaX Corp has secured an oversubscribed $17 million Series A financing round as it seeks to ramp up its development and commercialization of exosome-based regenerative biologics. The Houston-based company says it is developing “biologically informed” approaches aimed at […] The post PranaX lands $17m to harness exosomes in regenerative biologics appeared first on Longevity.Technology.
author: Danny Sullivan
